00039 /* initialization and termination */
00040 
00041 void reset_meters( void )
00042 {
00043     if ( uni->meter.flag )
00044     {                           // reset metering completely
00045         int i,
00046             k;
00047 
00048         for ( i = 0; i < RXMETERPTS; i++ )
00049             for ( k = 0; k < MAXRX; k++ )
00050                 uni->meter.rx.val[k][i] = -KINDA;
00051         for ( i = 0; i < TXMETERPTS; i++ )
00052             uni->meter.tx.val[i] = -KINDA;
00053     }
00054 }
00055 
00056 void reset_spectrum( void )
00057 {
00058     if ( uni->spec.flag )
00059         reinit_spectrum( &uni->spec );
00060 }
00061 
00062 void reset_counters( void )
00063 {
00064     int k;
00065 
00066     for ( k = 0; k < uni->multirx.nrx; k++ )
00067         rx[k]->tick = 0;
00068     tx->tick = 0;
00069 }

00077 PRIVATE void setup_all( REAL rate, int buflen, SDRMODE mode, char *wisdom,
00078                         int specsize, int numrecv, int cpdsize )
00079 {
00080 
00081     uni->samplerate = rate;
00082     uni->buflen = buflen;
00083     uni->mode.sdr = mode;
00084     uni->mode.trx = RX;
00085 
00086     uni->wisdom.path = wisdom;
00087     uni->wisdom.bits = FFTW_ESTIMATE;
00088     {
00089         FILE *f = fopen( uni->wisdom.path, "r" );
00090 
00091         if ( f )
00092         {
00093             if ( fftwf_import_wisdom_from_file( f ) != 0 )
00094                 uni->wisdom.bits = FFTW_MEASURE;
00095             fclose( f );
00096         }
00097     }
00098 
00099     if ( uni->meter.flag )
00100         reset_meters(  );
00101 
00102     uni->spec.rxk = 0;
00103     uni->spec.buflen = uni->buflen;
00104     uni->spec.scale = SPEC_PWR;
00105     uni->spec.type = SPEC_POST_FILT;
00106     uni->spec.size = specsize;
00107     uni->spec.planbits = uni->wisdom.bits;
00108     init_spectrum( &uni->spec );
00109 
00110     // set which receiver is listening to commands
00111     uni->multirx.lis = 0;
00112     uni->multirx.nrx = numrecv;
00113 
00114     uni->cpdlen = cpdsize;
00115 
00116     uni->tick = 0;
00117 }

00121 PRIVATE void setup_rx( int k )
00122 {
00123 
00124     /* conditioning */
00125     rx[k]->iqfix = newCorrectIQ( 0.0, 1.0 );
00126     rx[k]->filt.coef =
00127         newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( -4800.0, 4800.0, uni->samplerate,
00128                                  uni->buflen + 1 );
00129     rx[k]->filt.ovsv =
00130         newFiltOvSv( FIRcoef( rx[k]->filt.coef ), FIRsize( rx[k]->filt.coef ),
00131                      uni->wisdom.bits );
00132     normalize_vec_COMPLEX( rx[k]->filt.ovsv->zfvec,
00133                            rx[k]->filt.ovsv->fftlen );
00134 
00135     // hack for EQ
00136     rx[k]->filt.save =
00137         newvec_COMPLEX( rx[k]->filt.ovsv->fftlen, "RX filter cache" );
00138     memcpy( ( char * ) rx[k]->filt.save, ( char * ) rx[k]->filt.ovsv->zfvec,
00139             rx[k]->filt.ovsv->fftlen * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00140 
00141     /* buffers */
00142     /* note we overload the internal filter buffers we just created */
00143     rx[k]->buf.i =
00144         newCXB( FiltOvSv_fetchsize( rx[k]->filt.ovsv ),
00145                 FiltOvSv_fetchpoint( rx[k]->filt.ovsv ),
00146                 "init rx[k]->buf.i" );
00147 
00148     rx[k]->buf.o =
00149         newCXB( FiltOvSv_storesize( rx[k]->filt.ovsv ),
00150                 FiltOvSv_storepoint( rx[k]->filt.ovsv ),
00151                 "init rx[k]->buf.o" );
00152 
00153     /* conversion */
00154     rx[k]->osc.freq = -11025.0;
00155     rx[k]->osc.phase = 0.0;
00156     rx[k]->osc.gen =
00157         newOSC( uni->buflen, ComplexTone, rx[k]->osc.freq, rx[k]->osc.phase,
00158                 uni->samplerate, "SDR RX Oscillator" );
00159 
00160     rx[k]->dttspagc.gen = newDttSPAgc( 1,   // mode kept around for control reasons alone
00161                                        CXBbase( rx[k]->buf.o ), // input buffer
00162                                        CXBsize( rx[k]->buf.o ), // output buffer
00163                                        1.0, // Target output 
00164                                        2.0, // Attack time constant in ms
00165                                        500, // Decay time constant in ms
00166                                        1.0, // Slope
00167                                        500, //Hangtime in ms
00168                                        uni->samplerate, // Sample rate
00169                                        31622.8, // Maximum gain as a multipler, linear not dB
00170                                        0.00001, // Minimum gain as a multipler, linear not dB
00171                                        1.0, // Set the current gain
00172                                        "AGC" ); // Set a tag for an error message if the memory allocation fails
00173 
00174     rx[k]->dttspagc.flag = TRUE;
00175 
00176     rx[k]->grapheq.gen =
00177         new_EQ( rx[k]->buf.o, uni->samplerate, uni->wisdom.bits );
00178     rx[k]->grapheq.flag = FALSE;
00179 
00180     /* demods */
00181     rx[k]->am.gen = newAMD( uni->samplerate,    // REAL samprate
00182                             0.0,    // REAL f_initial
00183                             -500.0, // REAL f_lobound,
00184                             500.0,  // REAL f_hibound,
00185                             400.0,  // REAL f_bandwid,
00186                             CXBsize( rx[k]->buf.o ),    // int size,
00187                             CXBbase( rx[k]->buf.o ),    // COMPLEX *ivec,
00188                             CXBbase( rx[k]->buf.o ),    // COMPLEX *ovec,
00189                             AMdet,  // AM Mode AMdet == rectifier,
00190                             //         SAMdet == synchronous detector
00191                             "AM detector blew" );   // char *tag
00192     rx[k]->fm.gen = newFMD( uni->samplerate,    // REAL samprate
00193                             0.0,    // REAL f_initial
00194                             -6000.0,    // REAL f_lobound
00195                             6000.0, // REAL f_hibound
00196                             5000.0, // REAL f_bandwid
00197                             CXBsize( rx[k]->buf.o ),    // int size
00198                             CXBbase( rx[k]->buf.o ),    // COMPLEX *ivec
00199                             CXBbase( rx[k]->buf.o ),    // COMPLEX *ovec
00200                             "New FM Demod structure" ); // char *error message;
00201 
00202     /* noise reduction */
00203     rx[k]->anf.gen = new_lmsr( rx[k]->buf.o,    // CXB signal,
00204                                64,  // int delay,
00205                                0.01,    // REAL adaptation_rate,
00206                                0.00001, // REAL leakage,
00207                                45,  // int adaptive_filter_size,
00208                                LMADF_INTERFERENCE );
00209     rx[k]->anf.flag = FALSE;
00210     rx[k]->banf.gen =
00211         new_blms( rx[k]->buf.o, 0.00001, 0.005, LMADF_INTERFERENCE,
00212                   uni->wisdom.bits );
00213     rx[k]->banf.flag = FALSE;
00214 
00215     rx[k]->anr.gen = new_lmsr( rx[k]->buf.o,    // CXB signal,
00216                                64,  // int delay,
00217                                0.01,    // REAL adaptation_rate,
00218                                0.00001, // REAL leakage,
00219                                45,  // int adaptive_filter_size,
00220                                LMADF_NOISE );
00221     rx[k]->anr.flag = FALSE;
00222     rx[k]->banr.gen =
00223         new_blms( rx[k]->buf.o, 0.00001f, 0.005f, LMADF_NOISE,
00224                   uni->wisdom.bits );
00225     rx[k]->banr.flag = FALSE;
00226 
00227     rx[k]->nb.thresh = 3.3;
00228     rx[k]->nb.gen = new_noiseblanker( rx[k]->buf.i, rx[k]->nb.thresh );
00229     rx[k]->nb.flag = FALSE;
00230 
00231     rx[k]->nb_sdrom.thresh = 2.5;
00232     rx[k]->nb_sdrom.gen =
00233         new_noiseblanker( rx[k]->buf.i, rx[k]->nb_sdrom.thresh );
00234     rx[k]->nb_sdrom.flag = FALSE;
00235 
00236     rx[k]->spot.gen = newSpotToneGen( -12.0,    // gain
00237                                       700.0,    // freq
00238                                       5.0,  // ms rise
00239                                       5.0,  // ms fall
00240                                       uni->buflen,  // length of spot tone buffer
00241                                       uni->samplerate );    // sample rate
00242 
00243     memset( ( char * ) &rx[k]->squelch, 0, sizeof( rx[k]->squelch ) );
00244     rx[k]->squelch.thresh = -150.0;
00245     rx[k]->squelch.power = 0.0;
00246     rx[k]->squelch.flag = rx[k]->squelch.running = rx[k]->squelch.set = FALSE;
00247     rx[k]->squelch.num = uni->buflen - 48;
00248 
00249     rx[k]->cpd.gen = newWSCompander( uni->cpdlen, 0.0, rx[k]->buf.o );
00250     rx[k]->cpd.flag = FALSE;
00251 
00252     rx[k]->mode = uni->mode.sdr;
00253     rx[k]->bin.flag = FALSE;
00254 
00255     rx[k]->gain = 1.0;
00256 
00257     {
00258         REAL pos = 0.5,         // 0 <= pos <= 1, left->right
00259             theta = ( ( 1.0 - pos ) * M_PI / 2.0 );
00260 
00261         rx[k]->azim = Cmplx( cos( theta ), sin( theta ) );
00262     }
00263 
00264     rx[k]->tick = 0;
00265 }

00269 PRIVATE void setup_tx( void )
00270 {
00271 
00272     /* conditioning */
00273     tx->iqfix = newCorrectIQ( 0.0, 1.0 );
00274     tx->filt.coef =
00275         newFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( 300.0, 3000.0, uni->samplerate,
00276                                  uni->buflen + 1 );
00277     tx->filt.ovsv =
00278         newFiltOvSv( FIRcoef( tx->filt.coef ), FIRsize( tx->filt.coef ),
00279                      uni->wisdom.bits );
00280     normalize_vec_COMPLEX( tx->filt.ovsv->zfvec, tx->filt.ovsv->fftlen );
00281 
00282     // hack for EQ
00283     tx->filt.save =
00284         newvec_COMPLEX( tx->filt.ovsv->fftlen, "TX filter cache" );
00285     memcpy( ( char * ) tx->filt.save, ( char * ) tx->filt.ovsv->zfvec,
00286             tx->filt.ovsv->fftlen * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00287 
00288     /* buffers */
00289     tx->buf.i =
00290         newCXB( FiltOvSv_fetchsize( tx->filt.ovsv ),
00291                 FiltOvSv_fetchpoint( tx->filt.ovsv ), "init tx->buf.i" );
00292     tx->buf.o =
00293         newCXB( FiltOvSv_storesize( tx->filt.ovsv ),
00294                 FiltOvSv_storepoint( tx->filt.ovsv ), "init tx->buf.o" );
00295 
00296     tx->dcb.flag = FALSE;
00297     tx->dcb.gen = newDCBlocker( DCB_MED, tx->buf.i );
00298 
00299     /* conversion */
00300     tx->osc.freq = 0.0;
00301     tx->osc.phase = 0.0;
00302     tx->osc.gen =
00303         newOSC( uni->buflen, ComplexTone, tx->osc.freq, tx->osc.phase,
00304                 uni->samplerate, "SDR TX Oscillator" );
00305 
00306     tx->am.carrier_level = 0.5;
00307     tx->fm.cvtmod2freq = 2500.0 * TWOPI / uni->samplerate;  //5 kHz deviation
00308 
00309     tx->leveler.gen = newDttSPAgc( 1,   // mode kept around for control reasons
00310                                    CXBbase( tx->buf.i ),    // input buffer
00311                                    CXBsize( tx->buf.i ),    // output buffer
00312                                    1.1, // Target output
00313                                    2,   // Attack time constant in ms
00314                                    500, // Decay time constant in ms
00315                                    1,   // Slope
00316                                    500, //Hangtime in ms
00317                                    uni->samplerate, // Sample rate
00318                                    5.62,    // Maximum gain as a multipler, linear not dB
00319                                    1.0, // Minimum gain as a multipler, linear not dB
00320                                    1.0, // Set the current gain
00321                                    "LVL" ); // Set a tag for an error message if the memory allocation fails
00322     tx->leveler.flag = TRUE;
00323 
00324     tx->grapheq.gen = new_EQ( tx->buf.i, uni->samplerate, uni->wisdom.bits );
00325     tx->grapheq.flag = FALSE;
00326 
00327     memset( ( char * ) &tx->squelch, 0, sizeof( tx->squelch ) );
00328     tx->squelch.thresh = -40.0;
00329     tx->squelch.power = 0.0;
00330     tx->squelch.flag = FALSE;
00331     tx->squelch.running = tx->squelch.set = FALSE;
00332     tx->squelch.num = uni->buflen - 48;
00333 
00334     tx->alc.gen = newDttSPAgc( 1,   // mode kept around for control reasons alone
00335                                CXBbase( tx->buf.i ),    // input buffer
00336                                CXBsize( tx->buf.i ),    // output buffer
00337                                1.2, // Target output 
00338                                2,   // Attack time constant in ms
00339                                10,  // Decay time constant in ms
00340                                1,   // Slope
00341                                500, //Hangtime in ms
00342                                uni->samplerate, 1.0,    // Maximum gain as a multipler, linear not dB
00343                                0.000001,    // Minimum gain as a multipler, linear not dB
00344                                1.0, // Set the current gain
00345                                "ALC" ); // Set a tag for an error message if the memory allocation fails
00346     tx->alc.flag = TRUE;
00347 
00348     tx->spr.gen =
00349         newSpeechProc( 0.4, 3.0, CXBbase( tx->buf.i ), CXBsize( tx->buf.o ) );
00350     tx->spr.flag = FALSE;
00351 
00352     tx->cpd.gen = newWSCompander( uni->cpdlen, -3.0, tx->buf.i );
00353     tx->cpd.flag = FALSE;
00354 
00355     memset( ( char * ) &tx->sav, 0, sizeof( tx->sav ) );
00356 
00357     tx->mode = uni->mode.sdr;
00358 
00359     tx->tick = 0;
00360     /* not much else to do for TX */
00361 }

00363 /* how the outside world sees it */
00364 
00365 void setup_workspace( REAL rate, int buflen, SDRMODE mode, char *wisdom,
00366                       int specsize, int numrecv, int cpdsize )
00367 {
00368     int k;
00369 
00370     setup_all( rate, buflen, mode, wisdom, specsize, numrecv, cpdsize );
00371 
00372     for ( k = 0; k < uni->multirx.nrx; k++ )
00373     {
00374         setup_rx( k );
00375         uni->multirx.act[k] = FALSE;
00376     }
00377     uni->multirx.act[0] = TRUE;
00378     uni->multirx.nac = 1;
00379 
00380     setup_tx(  );
00381 }
00382 
00383 void destroy_workspace( void )
00384 {
00385     int k;
00386 
00387     /* TX */
00388     delWSCompander( tx->cpd.gen );
00389     delSpeechProc( tx->spr.gen );
00390     delDttSPAgc( tx->leveler.gen );
00391     delDttSPAgc( tx->alc.gen );
00392     delOSC( tx->osc.gen );
00393     delDCBlocker( tx->dcb.gen );
00394     delvec_COMPLEX( tx->filt.save );
00395     delFiltOvSv( tx->filt.ovsv );
00396     delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( tx->filt.coef );
00397     delCorrectIQ( tx->iqfix );
00398     delCXB( tx->buf.o );
00399     delCXB( tx->buf.i );
00400 
00401     /* RX */
00402     for ( k = 0; k < uni->multirx.nrx; k++ )
00403     {
00404         delWSCompander( rx[k]->cpd.gen );
00405         delSpotToneGen( rx[k]->spot.gen );
00406         delDttSPAgc( rx[k]->dttspagc.gen );
00407         del_nb( rx[k]->nb_sdrom.gen );
00408         del_nb( rx[k]->nb.gen );
00409         del_lmsr( rx[k]->anf.gen );
00410         del_lmsr( rx[k]->anr.gen );
00411         del_blms( rx[k]->banf.gen );
00412         del_blms( rx[k]->banr.gen );
00413         delAMD( rx[k]->am.gen );
00414         delFMD( rx[k]->fm.gen );
00415         delOSC( rx[k]->osc.gen );
00416         delvec_COMPLEX( rx[k]->filt.save );
00417         delFiltOvSv( rx[k]->filt.ovsv );
00418         delFIR_Bandpass_COMPLEX( rx[k]->filt.coef );
00419         delCorrectIQ( rx[k]->iqfix );
00420         delCXB( rx[k]->buf.o );
00421         delCXB( rx[k]->buf.i );
00422     }
00423 
00424     /* all */
00425     finish_spectrum( &uni->spec );
00426 }

00432 //========================================================================

00435 PRIVATE void CXBscl( CXB buff, REAL scl )
00436 {
00437     int i;
00438 
00439     for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( buff ); i++ )
00440         CXBdata( buff, i ) = Cscl( CXBdata( buff, i ), scl );
00441 }
00442 
00443 PRIVATE REAL CXBnorm( CXB buff )
00444 {
00445     int i;
00446     REAL sum = 0.0;
00447 
00448     for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( buff ); i++ )
00449         sum += Csqrmag( CXBdata( buff, i ) );
00450     return sqrt( sum );
00451 }
00452 
00453 PRIVATE REAL CXBnormsqr( CXB buff )
00454 {
00455     int i;
00456     REAL sum = 0.0;
00457 
00458     for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( buff ); i++ )
00459         sum += Csqrmag( CXBdata( buff, i ) );
00460     return sum;
00461 }
00462 
00463 PRIVATE REAL CXBpeak( CXB buff )
00464 {
00465     int i;
00466     REAL maxsam = 0.0;
00467 
00468     for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( buff ); i++ )
00469         maxsam = max( Cmag( CXBdata( buff, i ) ), maxsam );
00470     return maxsam;
00471 }
00472 
00473 PRIVATE REAL CXBpeakpwr( CXB buff )
00474 {
00475     int i;
00476     REAL maxpwr = 0.0;
00477 
00478     for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( buff ); i++ )
00479         maxpwr = max( Csqrmag( CXBdata( buff, i ) ), maxpwr );
00480     return maxpwr;
00481 }

00483 //========================================================================

00485 /* all */
00486 
00487 // unfortunate duplication here, due to
00488 // multirx vs monotx
00489 
00490 PRIVATE void do_rx_meter( int k, CXB buf, int tap )
00491 {
00492     COMPLEX *vec = CXBbase( buf );
00493     int i,
00494         len = CXBhave( buf );
00495 
00496     switch ( tap )
00497     {
00498 
00499     case RXMETER_PRE_CONV:
00500         for ( i = 0; i < len; i++ )
00501             uni->meter.rx.val[k][ADC_REAL] =
00502                 max( fabs( vec[i].re ), uni->meter.rx.val[k][ADC_REAL] );
00503         uni->meter.rx.val[k][ADC_REAL] =
00504             dBP( uni->meter.rx.val[k][ADC_REAL] );
00505         for ( i = 0; i < len; i++ )
00506             uni->meter.rx.val[k][ADC_IMAG] =
00507                 max( fabs( vec[i].im ), uni->meter.rx.val[k][ADC_IMAG] );
00508         uni->meter.rx.val[k][ADC_IMAG] =
00509             dBP( uni->meter.rx.val[k][ADC_IMAG] );
00510         break;
00511 
00512     case RXMETER_POST_FILT:
00513         uni->meter.rx.val[k][SIGNAL_STRENGTH] = 0;
00514         for ( i = 0; i < len; i++ )
00515             uni->meter.rx.val[k][SIGNAL_STRENGTH] += Csqrmag( vec[i] );
00516         rx[k]->norm = uni->meter.rx.val[k][SIGNAL_STRENGTH] / ( REAL ) len;
00517         uni->meter.rx.val[k][SIGNAL_STRENGTH] =
00518             Log10P( uni->meter.rx.val[k][SIGNAL_STRENGTH] );
00519         if ( uni->meter.rx.mode[k] == SIGNAL_STRENGTH )
00520             uni->meter.rx.val[k][AVG_SIGNAL_STRENGTH] =
00521                 uni->meter.rx.val[k][SIGNAL_STRENGTH];
00522         uni->meter.rx.val[k][AVG_SIGNAL_STRENGTH] =
00523             DamPlus( uni->meter.rx.val[k][AVG_SIGNAL_STRENGTH],
00524                      uni->meter.rx.val[k][SIGNAL_STRENGTH] );
00525         break;
00526 
00527     case RXMETER_POST_AGC:
00528         uni->meter.rx.val[k][AGC_GAIN] = dBP( rx[k]->dttspagc.gen->gain.now );
00529         break;
00530 
00531     default:
00532         break;
00533     }
00534 }
00535 
00536 PRIVATE void do_rx_spectrum( int k, CXB buf, int type )
00537 {
00538     if ( uni->spec.flag && k == uni->spec.rxk && type == uni->spec.type )
00539     {
00540         if ( ( uni->spec.type == SPEC_POST_DET ) && ( !rx[k]->bin.flag ) )
00541         {
00542             int i;
00543 
00544             for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.o ); i++ )
00545                 CXBdata( uni->spec.accum, uni->spec.fill + i ) =
00546                     Cmplx( CXBreal( rx[k]->buf.o, i ) * M_SQRT2, 0.0 );
00547         }
00548         else
00549         {
00550             memcpy( ( char * ) &CXBdata( uni->spec.accum, uni->spec.fill ),
00551                     ( char * ) CXBbase( buf ),
00552                     CXBsize( buf ) * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00553         }
00554         uni->spec.fill = ( uni->spec.fill + CXBsize( buf ) ) & uni->spec.mask;
00555     }
00556 }
00557 
00558 PRIVATE void do_tx_spectrum( CXB buf )
00559 {
00560     if ( uni->spec.type == SPEC_PREMOD )
00561     {
00562         int i;
00563 
00564         for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( tx->buf.i ); i++ )
00565             CXBdata( uni->spec.accum, uni->spec.fill + i ) =
00566                 Cmplx( CXBreal( tx->buf.i, i ), 0.0 );
00567     }
00568     else
00569     {
00570         memcpy( ( char * ) &CXBdata( uni->spec.accum, uni->spec.fill ),
00571                 ( char * ) CXBbase( buf ),
00572                 CXBsize( buf ) * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00573     }
00574     uni->spec.fill = ( uni->spec.fill + CXBsize( buf ) ) & uni->spec.mask;
00575 }
00576 
00577 //========================================================================
00578 
00579 /* RX processing */
00580 
00581 PRIVATE BOOLEAN should_do_rx_squelch( int k )
00582 {
00583     if ( rx[k]->squelch.flag )
00584     {
00585         int i,
00586             n = CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.o );
00587 
00588         rx[k]->squelch.power = 0.0;
00589 
00590         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00591             rx[k]->squelch.power += Csqrmag( CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ) );
00592 
00593         return Log10P( rx[k]->squelch.power ) < rx[k]->squelch.thresh;
00594 
00595     }
00596     else
00597         return rx[k]->squelch.set = FALSE;
00598 }
00599 
00600 // located here for symmetry
00601 
00602 PRIVATE BOOLEAN should_do_tx_squelch( void )
00603 {
00604     if ( tx->squelch.flag )
00605     {
00606         int i,
00607             n = CXBsize( tx->buf.i );
00608 
00609         tx->squelch.power = 0.0;
00610 
00611         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00612             tx->squelch.power += Csqrmag( CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) );
00613 
00614         return ( -30 + Log10P( tx->squelch.power ) ) < tx->squelch.thresh;
00615 
00616     }
00617     else
00618         return tx->squelch.set = FALSE;
00619 }
00620 
00621 // apply squelch
00622 // slew into silence first time
00623 
00624 PRIVATE void do_rx_squelch( int k )
00625 {
00626     rx[k]->squelch.set = TRUE;
00627 
00628     if ( !rx[k]->squelch.running )
00629     {
00630         int i,
00631             m = rx[k]->squelch.num,
00632             n = CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.o ) - m;
00633 
00634         for ( i = 0; i < m; i++ )
00635             CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ) =
00636                 Cscl( CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ), ( 1.0 - ( REAL ) i / m ) );
00637 
00638         memset( ( void * ) ( CXBbase( rx[k]->buf.o ) + m ), 0,
00639                 n * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00640         rx[k]->squelch.running = TRUE;
00641 
00642     }
00643     else
00644         memset( ( void * ) CXBbase( rx[k]->buf.o ), 0,
00645                 CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.o ) * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00646 }
00647 
00648 PRIVATE void do_tx_squelch( void )
00649 {
00650     tx->squelch.set = TRUE;
00651 
00652     if ( !tx->squelch.running )
00653     {
00654         int i,
00655             m = tx->squelch.num,
00656             n = CXBhave( tx->buf.i ) - m;
00657 
00658         for ( i = 0; i < m; i++ )
00659             CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) =
00660                 Cscl( CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ), ( 1.0 - ( REAL ) i / m ) );
00661 
00662         memset( ( void * ) ( CXBbase( tx->buf.i ) + m ), 0,
00663                 n * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00664         tx->squelch.running = TRUE;
00665 
00666     }
00667     else
00668         memset( ( void * ) CXBbase( tx->buf.i ), 0,
00669                 CXBhave( tx->buf.i ) * sizeof( COMPLEX ) );
00670 }
00671 
00672 // lift squelch
00673 // slew out from silence to full scale
00674 
00675 PRIVATE void no_rx_squelch( int k )
00676 {
00677     if ( rx[k]->squelch.running )
00678     {
00679         int i,
00680             m = rx[k]->squelch.num;
00681 
00682         for ( i = 0; i < m; i++ )
00683             CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ) =
00684                 Cscl( CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ), ( REAL ) i / m );
00685 
00686         rx[k]->squelch.running = FALSE;
00687     }
00688 }
00689 
00690 PRIVATE void no_tx_squelch( void )
00691 {
00692     if ( tx->squelch.running )
00693     {
00694         int i,
00695             m = tx->squelch.num;
00696 
00697         for ( i = 0; i < m; i++ )
00698             CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) =
00699                 Cscl( CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ), ( REAL ) i / m );
00700 
00701         tx->squelch.running = FALSE;
00702     }
00703 }
00704 
00705 // pre-condition for (nearly) all RX modes
00706 
00707 PRIVATE void do_rx_pre( int k )
00708 {
00709     int i,
00710         n = min( CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.i ), uni->buflen );
00711 
00712     if ( rx[k]->nb.flag )
00713         noiseblanker( rx[k]->nb.gen );
00714     if ( rx[k]->nb_sdrom.flag )
00715         SDROMnoiseblanker( rx[k]->nb_sdrom.gen );
00716 
00717     // metering for uncorrected values here
00718 
00719     do_rx_meter( k, rx[k]->buf.i, RXMETER_PRE_CONV );
00720 
00721     correctIQ( rx[k]->buf.i, rx[k]->iqfix );
00722 
00723     /* 2nd IF conversion happens here */
00724 
00725     if ( rx[k]->osc.gen->Frequency != 0.0 )
00726     {
00727         ComplexOSC( rx[k]->osc.gen );
00728         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00729             CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.i, i ) =
00730                 Cmul( CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.i, i ),
00731                       OSCCdata( rx[k]->osc.gen, i ) );
00732     }
00733 
00734     /* filtering, metering, spectrum, squelch, & AGC */
00735 
00736     //do_rx_meter (k, rx[k]->buf.i, RXMETER_PRE_FILT);
00737     do_rx_spectrum( k, rx[k]->buf.i, SPEC_PRE_FILT );
00738     if ( rx[k]->mode != SPEC )
00739     {
00740         if ( rx[k]->tick == 0 )
00741             reset_OvSv( rx[k]->filt.ovsv );
00742 
00743         filter_OvSv( rx[k]->filt.ovsv );
00744     }
00745     else
00746         memcpy( CXBbase( rx[k]->buf.o ), CXBbase( rx[k]->buf.i ),
00747                 sizeof( COMPLEX ) * CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.i ) );
00748 
00749     CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.o ) = CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.i );
00750 
00751     do_rx_meter( k, rx[k]->buf.o, RXMETER_POST_FILT );
00752     do_rx_spectrum( k, rx[k]->buf.o, SPEC_POST_FILT );
00753 
00754     if ( rx[k]->cpd.flag )
00755         WSCompand( rx[k]->cpd.gen );
00756 
00757     DttSPAgc( rx[k]->dttspagc.gen, rx[k]->tick );
00758 
00759     do_rx_meter( k, rx[k]->buf.o, RXMETER_POST_AGC );
00760     do_rx_spectrum( k, rx[k]->buf.o, SPEC_POST_AGC );
00761 }
00762 
00763 PRIVATE void do_rx_post( int k )
00764 {
00765     int i,
00766         n = CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.o );
00767 
00768     if ( rx[k]->squelch.set )
00769         do_rx_squelch( k );
00770     else
00771     {
00772         no_rx_squelch( k );
00773         // spotting tone
00774         if ( rx[k]->spot.flag )
00775         {
00776             // remember whether it's turned itself off during this pass
00777             rx[k]->spot.flag = SpotTone( rx[k]->spot.gen );
00778             for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00779                 CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ) =
00780                     Cadd( CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ),
00781                           CXBdata( rx[k]->spot.gen->buf, i ) );
00782         }
00783     }
00784 
00785     if ( rx[k]->grapheq.flag )
00786         graphiceq( rx[k]->grapheq.gen );
00787 
00788     do_rx_spectrum( k, rx[k]->buf.o, SPEC_POST_DET );
00789 
00790     // apply individual rx gain
00791 
00792     if ( rx[k]->gain != 1.0 )
00793         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00794             CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ) =
00795                 Cscl( CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ), rx[k]->gain );
00796 
00797     // not binaural?
00798     // position in stereo field
00799 
00800     if ( !rx[k]->bin.flag )
00801         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00802             CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ) =
00803                 Cscl( rx[k]->azim, M_SQRT2 * CXBreal( rx[k]->buf.o, i ) );
00804 }
00805 
00806 /* demod processing */
00807 
00808 PRIVATE void do_rx_SBCW( int k )
00809 {
00810 
00811     if ( rx[k]->bin.flag )
00812     {
00813         if ( ( rx[k]->banr.flag ) && ( rx[k]->anr.flag ) )
00814             blms_adapt( rx[k]->banr.gen );
00815         if ( ( rx[k]->banf.flag ) && ( rx[k]->anf.flag ) )
00816             blms_adapt( rx[k]->banf.gen );
00817 
00818     }
00819     else
00820     {
00821         int i;
00822 
00823         if ( rx[k]->anr.flag )
00824             if ( rx[k]->banr.flag )
00825                 blms_adapt( rx[k]->banr.gen );
00826             else
00827                 lmsr_adapt( rx[k]->anr.gen );
00828         if ( rx[k]->anf.flag )
00829             if ( rx[k]->banf.flag )
00830                 blms_adapt( rx[k]->banf.gen );
00831             else
00832                 lmsr_adapt( rx[k]->anf.gen );
00833         for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.o ); i++ )
00834             CXBimag( rx[k]->buf.o, i ) = CXBreal( rx[k]->buf.o, i );
00835     }
00836 }
00837 
00838 PRIVATE void do_rx_AM( int k )
00839 {
00840     AMDemod( rx[k]->am.gen );
00841     if ( rx[k]->anf.flag )
00842         if ( !rx[k]->banf.flag )
00843             lmsr_adapt( rx[k]->anf.gen );
00844         else
00845             blms_adapt( rx[k]->banf.gen );
00846 }
00847 
00848 PRIVATE void do_rx_FM( int k )
00849 {
00850     FMDemod( rx[k]->fm.gen );
00851 }
00852 
00853 PRIVATE void do_rx_DRM( int k )
00854 {
00855 }
00856 
00857 PRIVATE void do_rx_SPEC( int k )
00858 {
00859 }
00860 
00861 PRIVATE void do_rx_NIL( int k )
00862 {
00863     int i,
00864         n = min( CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.i ), uni->buflen );
00865 
00866     for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00867         CXBdata( rx[k]->buf.o, i ) = cxzero;
00868 }
00869 
00870 /* overall dispatch for RX processing */
00871 
00872 PRIVATE void do_rx( int k )
00873 {
00874     do_rx_pre( k );
00875     switch ( rx[k]->mode )
00876     {
00877     case DIGU:
00878     case DIGL:
00879     case USB:
00880     case LSB:
00881     case CWU:
00882     case CWL:
00883     case DSB:
00884         do_rx_SBCW( k );
00885         break;
00886     case AM:
00887     case SAM:
00888         do_rx_AM( k );
00889         break;
00890     case FMN:
00891         do_rx_FM( k );
00892         break;
00893     case DRM:
00894         do_rx_DRM( k );
00895         break;
00896     case SPEC:
00897     default:
00898         do_rx_SPEC( k );
00899         break;
00900     }
00901     do_rx_post( k );
00902 }
00903 
00904 //==============================================================
00905 
00906 /* TX processing */
00907 
00908 PRIVATE void do_tx_meter( CXB buf, TXMETERTYPE mt )
00909 {
00910     int i,
00911         len = CXBhave( buf );
00912 
00913     switch ( mt )
00914     {
00915 
00916     case TX_MIC:
00917         for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( tx->buf.i ); i++ )
00918             tx->sav.mic =
00919                 DamPlus( tx->sav.mic, Csqrmag( CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) ) );
00920         uni->meter.tx.val[TX_MIC] = Log10Q( tx->sav.mic );
00921         break;
00922 
00923     case TX_PWR:
00924         for ( i = 0, uni->meter.tx.val[TX_PWR] = BITSY;
00925               i < CXBhave( tx->buf.o ); i++ )
00926             uni->meter.tx.val[TX_PWR] += Csqrmag( CXBdata( tx->buf.o, i ) );
00927         uni->meter.tx.val[TX_PWR] /= ( REAL ) len;
00928         break;
00929 
00930     case TX_ALC:
00931         for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( tx->buf.i ); i++ )
00932             tx->sav.alc =
00933                 DamPlus( tx->sav.alc, Csqrmag( CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) ) );
00934         uni->meter.tx.val[TX_ALC] = Log10Q( tx->sav.alc );
00935         uni->meter.tx.val[TX_ALC_G] = dBP( tx->alc.gen->gain.now );;
00936         break;
00937 
00938     case TX_EQtap:
00939         for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( tx->buf.i ); i++ )
00940             tx->sav.eqtap =
00941                 DamPlus( tx->sav.eqtap, Csqrmag( CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) ) );
00942         uni->meter.tx.val[TX_EQtap] = Log10Q( tx->sav.eqtap );
00943         break;
00944 
00945     case TX_LEVELER:
00946         for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( tx->buf.i ); i++ )
00947             tx->sav.lvlr =
00948                 DamPlus( tx->sav.lvlr, Csqrmag( CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) ) );
00949         uni->meter.tx.val[TX_LEVELER] = Log10Q( tx->sav.lvlr );
00950         uni->meter.tx.val[TX_LVL_G] = dBP( tx->leveler.gen->gain.now );
00951         break;
00952 
00953     case TX_COMP:
00954         for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( tx->buf.i ); i++ )
00955             tx->sav.comp =
00956                 DamPlus( tx->sav.comp, Csqrmag( CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) ) );
00957         uni->meter.tx.val[TX_COMP] = Log10Q( tx->sav.comp );
00958         break;
00959 
00960     case TX_CPDR:
00961         for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( tx->buf.i ); i++ )
00962             tx->sav.cpdr =
00963                 DamPlus( tx->sav.cpdr, Csqrmag( CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) ) );
00964         uni->meter.tx.val[TX_CPDR] = Log10Q( tx->sav.cpdr );
00965         break;
00966 
00967     default:
00968         break;
00969     }
00970 }
00971 
00972 /* pre-condition for (nearly) all TX modes */
00973 
00974 PRIVATE void do_tx_pre( void )
00975 {
00976     int i,
00977         n = CXBhave( tx->buf.i );
00978 
00979     for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
00980         CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) = Cmplx( CXBimag( tx->buf.i, i ), 0.0 );
00981 
00982     if ( tx->dcb.flag )
00983         DCBlock( tx->dcb.gen );
00984 
00985     do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_MIC );
00986 
00987     if ( should_do_tx_squelch(  ) )
00988         do_tx_squelch(  );
00989     else
00990     {
00991         if ( !tx->squelch.set )
00992             no_tx_squelch(  );
00993         if ( ( tx->mode != DIGU ) && ( tx->mode != DIGL ) )
00994         {
00995             if ( tx->grapheq.flag )
00996                 graphiceq( tx->grapheq.gen );
00997             do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_EQtap );
00998             if ( tx->leveler.flag )
00999                 DttSPAgc( tx->leveler.gen, tx->tick );
01000             do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_LEVELER );
01001             if ( tx->spr.flag )
01002                 SpeechProcessor( tx->spr.gen );
01003             do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_COMP );
01004             if ( tx->cpd.flag )
01005                 WSCompand( tx->cpd.gen );
01006             do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_CPDR );
01007         }
01008         else
01009         {
01010             do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_EQtap );
01011             do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_LEVELER );
01012             do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_LVL_G );
01013             do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_COMP );
01014             do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_CPDR );
01015         }
01016     }
01017 }
01018 
01019 PRIVATE void do_tx_post( void )
01020 {
01021     CXBhave( tx->buf.o ) = CXBhave( tx->buf.i );
01022 
01023     if ( tx->tick == 0 )
01024         reset_OvSv( tx->filt.ovsv );
01025 
01026     filter_OvSv( tx->filt.ovsv );
01027     if ( uni->spec.flag )
01028         do_tx_spectrum( tx->buf.o );
01029 
01030     if ( tx->osc.gen->Frequency != 0.0 )
01031     {
01032         int i;
01033 
01034         ComplexOSC( tx->osc.gen );
01035         for ( i = 0; i < CXBhave( tx->buf.o ); i++ )
01036         {
01037             CXBdata( tx->buf.o, i ) =
01038                 Cmul( CXBdata( tx->buf.o, i ), OSCCdata( tx->osc.gen, i ) );
01039         }
01040     }
01041 
01042     correctIQ( tx->buf.o, tx->iqfix );
01043     do_tx_meter( tx->buf.o, TX_PWR );
01044 }
01045 
01046 /* modulator processing */
01047 
01048 PRIVATE void do_tx_SBCW( void )
01049 {
01050     int n = min( CXBhave( tx->buf.i ), uni->buflen );
01051 
01052     if ( tx->alc.flag && ( tx->mode != DIGU ) && ( tx->mode != DIGL ) )
01053         DttSPAgc( tx->alc.gen, tx->tick );
01054 
01055     do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_ALC );
01056 
01057     if ( tx->mode != DSB )
01058         CXBscl( tx->buf.i, 2.0 );
01059 }
01060 
01061 PRIVATE void do_tx_AM( void )
01062 {
01063     int i,
01064         n = min( CXBhave( tx->buf.i ), uni->buflen );
01065 
01066     if ( tx->alc.flag )
01067         DttSPAgc( tx->alc.gen, tx->tick );
01068 
01069     do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_ALC );
01070 
01071     for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
01072         CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) =
01073             Cmplx( tx->am.carrier_level +
01074                    ( 1.0 - tx->am.carrier_level ) * CXBreal( tx->buf.i, i ),
01075                    0.0 );
01076 }
01077 
01078 PRIVATE void do_tx_FM( void )
01079 {
01080     int i,
01081         n = min( CXBhave( tx->buf.i ), uni->buflen );
01082 
01083     if ( tx->alc.flag )
01084         DttSPAgc( tx->alc.gen, tx->tick );
01085 
01086     do_tx_meter( tx->buf.i, TX_ALC );
01087 
01088     for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
01089     {
01090         tx->osc.phase += CXBreal( tx->buf.i, i ) * tx->fm.cvtmod2freq;
01091         CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) =
01092             Cmplx( cos( tx->osc.phase ), sin( tx->osc.phase ) );
01093     }
01094 }
01095 
01096 PRIVATE void do_tx_NIL( void )
01097 {
01098     int i,
01099         n = min( CXBhave( tx->buf.i ), uni->buflen );
01100 
01101     for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
01102         CXBdata( tx->buf.i, i ) = cxzero;
01103 }
01104 
01105 /* general TX processing dispatch */
01106 
01107 PRIVATE void do_tx( void )
01108 {
01109     do_tx_pre(  );
01110     switch ( tx->mode )
01111     {
01112     case USB:
01113     case LSB:
01114     case CWU:
01115     case CWL:
01116     case DIGU:
01117     case DIGL:
01118     case DSB:
01119         do_tx_SBCW(  );
01120         break;
01121     case AM:
01122     case SAM:
01123         do_tx_AM(  );
01124         break;
01125     case FMN:
01126         do_tx_FM(  );
01127         break;
01128     case DRM:
01129     case SPEC:
01130     default:
01131         do_tx_NIL(  );
01132         break;
01133     }
01134     do_tx_post(  );
01135 }
01136 
01137 //========================================================================
01138 
01139 /* overall buffer processing;
01140    come here when there are buffers to work on */
01141 
01142 void process_samples( float *bufl, float *bufr, int n )
01143 {
01144     int i,
01145         k;
01146 
01147     switch ( uni->mode.trx )
01148     {
01149 
01150     case RX:
01151 
01152         // make copies of the input for all receivers
01153         for ( k = 0; k < uni->multirx.nrx; k++ )
01154             if ( uni->multirx.act[k] )
01155             {
01156                 for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
01157                     CXBimag( rx[k]->buf.i, i ) =
01158                         bufl[i], CXBreal( rx[k]->buf.i, i ) = bufr[i];
01159                 CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.i ) = n;
01160             }
01161 
01162         // prepare buffers for mixing
01163         memset( ( char * ) bufl, 0, n * sizeof( float ) );
01164         memset( ( char * ) bufr, 0, n * sizeof( float ) );
01165 
01166         // run all receivers
01167         for ( k = 0; k < uni->multirx.nrx; k++ )
01168             if ( uni->multirx.act[k] )
01169             {
01170                 do_rx( k ), rx[k]->tick++;
01171                 // mix
01172                 for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
01173                     bufl[i] += CXBimag( rx[k]->buf.o, i ), bufr[i] +=
01174                         CXBreal( rx[k]->buf.o, i );
01175                 CXBhave( rx[k]->buf.o ) = n;
01176             }
01177 
01178         break;
01179 
01180     case TX:
01181 
01182         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
01183             CXBimag( tx->buf.i, i ) = bufl[i], CXBreal( tx->buf.i, i ) =
01184                 bufr[i];
01185         CXBhave( tx->buf.i ) = n;
01186         tx->norm = CXBpeak( tx->buf.i );
01187 
01188         do_tx(  ), tx->tick++;
01189 
01190         for ( i = 0; i < n; i++ )
01191             bufl[i] = CXBimag( tx->buf.o, i ), bufr[i] =
01192                 CXBreal( tx->buf.o, i );
01193         CXBhave( tx->buf.o ) = n;
01194 
01195         break;
01196     }
01197 
01198     uni->tick++;
01199 }
Generated on Thu Apr 5 14:11:31 2007 for DttSp by  1.5.1
